level.text: A record delivered by the statutory trust to the Mayor for filing pursuant to this chapter shall be signed by at least one of the trustees.
Any person may sign by an attorney in fact any record filed pursuant to this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 203 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
